    • getAxis

      public java.util.Comparator<T> getAxis​(int depth)
      Returns a comparator representing an axis, or dimension, of the tree. The axis is chosen based on the depth modulo the dimensions in the tree.
      Parameters:
      depth - the depth
      Returns:
      the comparator

      Find a list of k nearest elements in the tree given a query and distance metric. The distance metric should return a single precision scalar given two input elements.

      count - number of elements
